Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Is the art work for sale?

A: No, I do what I do because I love art. One of the main points of my art is to spread the beauty of nature to others. In rare cases, I auction off art at charity events.

-

Q: What is the best way to view your art on this website?

A: The home page has links to all my different series, or collections, of photos. If you see a photo that you like, click on the link below to see the series it belongs to, which will contain similar photos.

-

Q: How can we contact you?

A: My number is (207) 415-1930 and my email is bwoba@portlandart.com
